cwow2/selling-my-hive-goodbye.author: cwow2
cwow2/selling-my-hive-goodbye.title: Selling my Hive. Goodbye
cwow2/selling-my-hive-goodbye.body:
Selling my Hive for some BNB

OMG TRICK YA
--- A have been taking some Hive out of my account and the Ecosystem, I have not been powering down, I have just converted some of it to BNB on Binance. I wanted to get into other coins possible "Yolo coins" just for the fun of it, but also so I would have a chance to multiply the value by 100000% or whatever is normal in Crypto these days :p I honestly just want to gamble a bit more to see if I can gain more faster returns. Hive is good and all, but the growth is "slow" to some extend (not talking price) but also relatively "stable" with the 10% APR and 10% APY on HBD. So ye. I pulled a some liquid Hive and I also ended up withdrawing my 100 HBD to Binance where I put it into different coins. I only have a small amount in each coin and I just plan on HODL this to see if it can amount to anything.
These are the coins.
![Bcoins.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cwow2/23t8CSPFCNLG2X2sJTSRjcm61T2e6LfByJRf5GSs6BGupBLAk8YRT4KWRurhAJGVCqbMe.png) I might want to be a SHIB INU millionaire, since it doesn't take that much haha xD
